description.@en: There is no greater act than adhering to the word of God, and he has rewarded me greatly for my penitence and devotion.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you bear a symbol of faith in hand, add +1 to your Damage and Peril Thresholds. Randomly determine three Common Spells you learn as free Unique Abilities from the Common Spells Listings table. Finally, you can Risk Backlash and Unfetter your Spells (covered in Article 7: Combat Encounters and Article 9: Hexenmeister’s Almanack).
